title: Seafood couscous salad
ingredients: ['270ml water', '1 tablespoon fish stock, for flavour', '170g wholegrain couscous', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '50ml lemon juice', '1/2 cucumber', '1 leek, white part only, sliced 1/4cm thick', '1 celery stalk, minced', '2 firm tomatoes, chopped into 1cm pieces', '200g seafood sticks (surimi), chopped', '3 tablespoons chopped dill']
